sentence.Network_en: A cetacean ( Grampus griseus ) related to and resembling the dolphins but lacking a beaklike snout.
sentence.Network_cn: 灰海豚,逆戟鲸一种与海豚有亲缘关系并形似海豚的鲸类动物 ( 灰海豚灰海豚属 ),但缺少喙状口鼻部.
